Analyze, interpret, cleanse and process data to throw insights for designing various business initiatives and evaluating their effectiveness. This should significantly contribute towards the effective utilization of management bandwidth, resulting in swift and robust decision-making.
Participate in business analysis activities to gather required reporting and dashboard requirements.
Support the production of quality reports by developing reporting processes and identifying areas where value can be added.
Identify the facts in data and understand and manage a range of analytical and modeling projects from inception to delivery.
Own end-to-end data insights generation for the management team.
Communicate complex data in comprehensible ways.
Identify new sources of data and methods to improve data collection, analysis, and reporting.
Interact with internal teams to resolve any issues with process inputs/systems.
Identify and implement key operational, financial, and historical measurements to use in operational day-to-day management.
Respond to ad hoc requests from the stakeholders relating to the various deliverables.

Required Skills, Experience & Qualification:
At least two years in a project support or data-orientated role.
Strong analytical skills with proven experience in managing/ handling data.
Excellent skills in Microsoft Office, esp. Advanced MS Excel.
Ability to analyze data efficiently and advanced skills in the presentation of data.
Knowledge of data profiling and proven experience in data mining, collation, and dashboard creation.
Strong, professional written and verbal communication skills with the ability to work with all levels within the business; confident in one's ability to anticipate what is needed.
Good understanding of business drivers and service standards with a proactive approach to service improvement
Demonstrate a flexible approach to changes in the working practices and procedures.
Experience in using statistical techniques in a business environment.
Preferably the experience of or flair to learn SQL or SQL server.
Excellent time management & organization skills with a proven ability to self-manage, prioritize and meet deadlines.
The desired candidate should preferably be a Graduate in Engineering or Mathematics / Statistics with advanced degree/certification in Management / Business Analytics and 2 4 years of professional experience.

Kindly reach out at reemah.sharma@ascendion.com or feel free to connect on Mo. 7016392469

job_title: Data Analyst / Sr Data Analyst - FIntech
job_description:
About the role
As a Data Analyst, you will help shape credit, business, and collections strategies by using
data-driven insights. As a key member of the team, you work closely with leadership, credit, and
business teams to craft and execute analytics-driven strategies for business growth.

What are we looking for?

Excellent coding skills: Python coding (a must skill) and developing SQL queries.
(Modelling techniques such as predictive and segmentation model understanding is a plus but not mandatory).
Prior experience in a fintech in the portfolio, risk, or collections team is a strong plus.
Strategic & Analytical Orientation: Exceptional Logical | Analytical | Reasoning skills complemented by rigor and strong quantitative orientation –
Do you stop at producing the results or do you dive deeper into the why’s, how’s, and ponder on ifs?
Strong communication skills: Impeccable written and oral communications, coupled with strategic influencing skills and the ability to drive agreement through intellect, interpersonal and negotiation skills
Can you communicate (present) your results with confidence?
Strong business judgment, leadership, and integrity: She/he should be a tenacious
problem solver with good judgment and an open-minded approach. One who pushes the envelope but is rooted in ground reality
Open to learning new tools & techniques and following the latest thinking globally in academia and the business world
Lastly, if you are exceptionally self-driven, motivated, and comfortable with ambiguity.
This is a place for you!

Responsibilities

Analysis: Identify business challenges and opportunities for improvement and solve for them using business, statistical, and data analysis to make strategic recommendations
Execution: Includes the development of frameworks, hypotheses, tests, analysis and options, scope operational feasibility, leading implementation efforts and developing a monitoring plan
Develop data-driven solutions that enhance customer experience, optimize efficiency and mitigate risk.
Translate data mining results into a clear business-focused deliverable for decision-makers
Knowledge of how to leverage statistical models in algorithms is a plus
Multivariate analysis: identifying how several parameters can affect retention/behavior of the customer and identifying actions at different points of the customer lifecycle. What can you expect?
Showcasing and honing your skills in a leading fintech with data-driven decision-making at its core.
Work in a challenging environment with one of the best analytical mindset teams in the industry.
Riding the growth bandwagon of a high-growth company.
Flexibility to choose your career path toward Data Science modeling or analytics.

Preferred Qualifications & Experience

• Level of experience: 1 to 4 years

BE/MS/Ph.D./BTech in Computer Science, Engineering, Math, Operations Research,
Physics, Statistics, or Economics (focus on FinTech is a plus).
Work experience from similar companies preferred with relevant work experience in
Business or Data Analytics.

job_description:
Data Management: Covers jobs responsible for collection and extraction of data to be analyzed to support business needs and future trends improve business decisions.

Responsibilities
About this role:
Wells Fargo is seeking a Data Management Analyst...

In this role, you will:
Design and conduct moderately complex analysis to identify and remediate data quality or integrity issues and to identify and remediate process or control gaps
Adhere to data governance standards and procedures
Support communications with basic documentation related to requirements, design decisions, issue closure, or remediation updates
Develop SQL scripts to perform Data validation and management on Enterprise Data Lake.
Perform UAT execution to ensure data is conformed correctly in alignment to Business requirements.
Utilize WellsFargo Automation Framework (WAF) - BDD (Behavior Driven Development) to create/modify Automation Test Scripts.
Support issue remediation by performing basic to mildly complex data profiling, data or business analysis, and data mapping as part of root cause or impact analysis
Provide support to regulatory analysis and reporting requirements
Recommend plans for the development and implementation of initiatives that assess the quality of new data sources
Work with business and technology partners or subject matter professionals to document or maintain business or technical metadata about systems, business or data elements, or data-related controls
Consult with clients to assess the current state of data quality within area of assigned responsibility

Required Qualifications, US:
10+ years of Data Management, Business Analysis, Analytics, Project Management experience, or equivalent demonstrated through one or a combination of the following: work experience, training, military experience, education
Ability to lead testing strategy work and create clear roadmap for team
Good SQL knowledge and work experience
Knowledge of manual and automated testing
Knowledge of Terra data / Big Data / MongoDB
Deep knowledge of BDD (Behavior Driven Development) automation framework
Basic understanding of JAVA technology
Other Qualifications
Understanding of WellsFargo Automation Framework (WAF)
Ability to think strategically, implement, and deliver business objectives
Ability to negotiate, influence, and collaborate to build successful relationships
Strong analytical skills with high attention to detail and accuracy
Excellent verbal, written, and interpersonal communication skills
Highly developed interpersonal and communication skills; proven ability to engage and influence senior technology and business executives
Excellent verbal, written, and interpersonal communication skills
Driven, confident, organized and an accomplished problem solver

Understand business data needs, data subject areas, data models, and end-to-end solution to meet user needs
Maintains necessary processes, controls, and procedures to ensure data accuracy and integrity
Maintains reference datasets
Performs complex analysis of master and reference datasets and conduct data validation
Works with Wholesale lines of business and other stakeholders to understand requirements and impact.
Provides technical assistance in identifying and evaluating automated systems and related procedures that are cost effective and meet business requirements.
Execute test plans and programming activities.
Works with user groups to provide training, resolve questions, assess user needs and recommend changes to the automated systems.
Gathers data and prepares necessary reports.
Updates reports and databases used by the client group.
Essential Qualifications
University degree in any discipline or related discipline.
8+ years of business systems analysis, design experience or combination of both
6+ years of experience in Proficiency with SQL (Oracle Teradata systems), PLSQL and working with advanced SQL coding and practices.
6+ years of experience gathering, analyzing, and interpreting large datasets.
6+ years of experience with Agile project methodologies Confluence Jira tools
Develop source-to-target mappings for source-to-APP and APP-to-target
Excellent verbal, written, and interpersonal communication skills
Solid experience with MS Excel
Reference and/or Master Data Management Experience
Knowledge and understanding of data governance challenges and approaches: metadata, data quality, data lineage, and data modeling and data dictionary.
Knowledge and understanding of research and analysis
Strong analytical skills with high attention to detail and accuracy
Ability to articulate complex concepts in a clear manner
Ability to negotiate, influence, and collaborate to build successful relationship
Ability to work effectively in a team environment and across all organizational levels, where flexibility, collaboration, and adaptability are important

Basic knowledge and understanding of data integrity management practices and procedures
Experience writing Business Requirements Documents (BRDs)

exp in data-cleaning processes and tools
